home.description1: Track events, socialize and use the message board for your life and business.
home.description2: Your place to buy and sell: whether it's an old car or renting an apartment. Easier and faster!
home.description3: Discover a world of local news, talk about events in your neighborhood and share service reviews.
home.description4: Capture the beauty of Seychelles and share spectacular moments with our community.
home.description5: Order a review or report from Almanet, advertise and find your audience on our platform.

signUp.title: Join Almanet
signUp.description: Sign up to be one of the first

signUpViaGoogle.title: Strengthen your social network
signUpViaGoogle.description: Your Facebook account will allow you to get account personalization

signUpViaFacebook.title: Be the first to the Almanet
signUpViaFacebook.description: Enter your e-mail to get access to the platform first. We'll send you a link before the official release and also provide a bonus to promote your profile

signUpFinal.title: Thank you
signUpFinal.description: We'll send a link to early access to the platform and all the information you need for you. Follow us on social media
